column1: Common Bond Bistro & Bakery - Montrose////There seems to be a divide in the reviews among the people who came for breakfast
column2: and everything else later in the day. We were in the area one Sunday afternoon
column3: and decided to swing by about an hour before closing. I was a little disappointed that there were no croissants left
column4: but early bird gets the worm. So we made do and ordered a few yummy looking items to go: chocolate chip cookie
